game.name: DragnBoom Online
game.description:
This cute little dragon is extremely dangerous and full of anger and power. Although his intense strength makes him a strongest dragon, he does not know to apply his fighting skills to survive and roast the neighboring lords. Luckily he has spotted you who is equipped with fabulous fighting skills. Are you ready to go on this brand new adventure challenge? Join Dragon Boom Online game and get a chance to play the character of a little rebellious teenage Dragon! Try to be strong all the time and burn everything you see in your path without showing mercy on them. 

In this one of the best adventure games for boys, your objective is to get your neighboring lords roasted and amass the greatest Treasure by stealing their gold. The completion of this job requires paying heed to the instructions and keeping eyes on the enemies and spikes. Collect coins and pick chests to improve your score and clear the level fast. Do not forget to evade the spikes to stay in the game. Remember your dragon will also have the power to autoshot some enemies. You can aim your target and move your character by touching the screen. 

Do not delay anymore! Help your little dragon to transform into a monster that shoots fire and kill enemies shortly in this free online platform game. Make him jump high or move him forward or backward as per your need. Try to reach the box full of gold as fast as you can to score high and finish the level in this cool HTML5 game. Use your talent and see how far you can go along with this cute dragon. Play many more fight games on your mobile by accessing our free online game website in just a few clicks.
